El reto de consiguir el mejor nivel de s: The challange of achieving the maximum level of service with the best possible profit
Porcentaje de la demanda total acumulada: Percentage of the accumulated total demand satisfied until the current period

¿Tiene dudas o sugerencias?: Do you have questions or suggestions?
Estaremos encantados de atenderle, pero: We will be please to answer them, but please, finish your simulation before leaving this page.
Simula las operaciones de compra-venta d: Simulates purchase-sale operations in a warehouse
En esta simulación, los alumnos desempeñ: In this simulation, students play the role of a distributor located at the intermediate node of a supply chain formed by the manufacturer, the distributor and the points of sale. They perform operations with customers, from whom they receive orders, and with suppliers, to whom they send their purchase orders and from whom they receive products.
El objetivo es conseguir el mayor nivel: The objective is to attain the highest possible level of service with the best profit. In order to accomplish this, sales to customers must be maximized, guaranteeing the least possible availability of products necessary to satisfy their demand, thereby reducing operating costs and obtaining the highest profit. The game demonstrates the complexity of managing different concepts that exist in real life in the world of operations, such as demand, stock, lead times and levels of service.
Denominamos Aguas arriba a los nodos de: We say nodes of the supply network that are closer to product manufacturing processes are "upstream".
Denominamos Aguas abajo a los nodos de l: We say nodes of the supply network that are closer to the source of the demand or the end consumers are "downstream".
El juego transcurre durante 40 periodos: The game takes place during 40 periods of time, which may commonly represent days or weeks. In each period, the player will have a specific stock level and will receive a random value that represents the overall demand of his customers for that period. Based on the stock level available and the product demand received from "downstream," the player needs to decide which quantity of products to order from his suppliers "upstream," keeping in mind their lead times. The order placed to the suppliers on each period will be received once the corresponding lead time has transpired, which is contained in the list of parameters of the gamification.
El usuario tiene acceso a todas las vari: The user has access to all operational variables through a section of the screen called ‘control panel’. The lead time and the initial stock level are two of the variables that may be modified by the instructor or game administrator.
Por otro lado, el jugador tendrá disponi: On the other hand, the player will at all times have at his disposal a view of the following 20 periods of time, where he will be able to see products that are pending to be received from the suppliers, called "en route" products or products pending reception. At the period in which products arrive at the warehouse, they disappear from the "en route" row and are added to the available stock. This is another variable that needs to be kept in mind when placing orders on each period.
Los ingresos y los distintos tipos de co: Income and different types of costs
Al final de cada periodo se realiza el c: At the end of each period, revenues resulting from sales and operating costs are calculated. Both amounts will let us calculate profits for the operations in each period, and sum the totals in order to calculate the overall profitability of the distributor’s activity. Maximizing revenues and reducing costs is the challenge of the game, from an outlook of profitability.
Los ingresos unitarios por ventas y los: Per-unit sales revenues and the various types of costs per unit are variable parameters that can be defined by the administrator of the game and appear in the player’s control panel. They are described below:
Por cada unidad vendida se registran uno: Sales revenues are added for each unit sold, using the unit selling price.
Por cada unidad pedida a proveedores se: Product purchase costs are added for each unit ordered from suppliers, using the unit purchase cost.
Por cada unidad de demanda no satisfecha: An opportunity cost is added for each demand unit that is not met in a period due to stock-out, using the unit opportunity cost.
Por cada unidad de exceso de productos e: A carrying cost is added for each unit of overstock, using the unit carrying cost.
El juego proporciona un panel de control: The game offers a control panel where all relevant information during the simulation is provided. The control panel is divided into four blocks:
El primero por la izquierda muestra el i: The first one from the left shows the game’s icon and the buttons to
la simulación. El juego está programado: the simulation. The game is programmed to execute forty uninterrupted periods in which a demand is received and a decision is made on the quantity to order.
es el que permite arrancar el proceso y: sets the process in motion and starts the simulation at the first period.
permite una salida anticipada de la simu: allows the simulation to be ended prematurely, but one must keep in mind that the results of all simulation executions, even those that are ended prematurely, are registered along with all usage data in order to facilitate the collection of results when courses are involved. It is therefore not recommended to use this option during academic tests without consulting your instructor or the instance’s administrator.
El segundo bloque por la izquierda,: The second square from the left,
, muestra el periodo en el que se encuen: , shows the period the simulation is currently at, and the newly generated demand and available stock for the period. The difference between this demand value and the one shown on the first row of the table that includes the 20-period visualization is that the latter includes all the accrued demand pending delivery, including that of the latest period, while the value shown on the control panel only includes the new demand for the period.
En el tercer bloque por la izquierda,: In the third block from the left,
, el usuario introduce periodo a periodo: , the user enters his "upstream" orders, period by period.
El campo numérico encima del botón Pedir: The numeric field over the Order button can be used to enter on each period the value of the quantity to order. This value may range between 0 and 10 units.
El bloque final muestra dos botones para: The final block contains two buttons that are used to see graphs for level of service and profit, as well as a drop-down block displaying the game’s operative variables. These variables have default values that may be modified by the instructor or the administrator of the gamification instance.
Hay que tener en cuenta que el perfil de: Keep in mind that the instructor’s or instance administrator’s profile has access to modify the values of these parameters, which allows the level of difficulty to be changed in order to obtain the best level of service and profitability. Performing several executions of this gamification using different parameters is the best way to experience the effect of these changes. This user profile will have access to the final results of the execution for each player in the instance.
Durante todo el juego y al final de la e: Throughout the entire game and at the end of its execution, the user may view the level of service achieved up to the current period and his total profit accrued until this period.
El ciclo de la actividad comercial para: The commercial activity cicle to reach the business targets with the best efficiency
Botones de inicio y finalización de la g: Gamification start and finish buttons. It is recommended not to finish the simulation prior to the end of the program execution.
Porcentaje del tiempo total empleado en: Percentage of the total time consumed by the sales activity converted into sales
Porcentaje de clientes potenciales conve: Percentage of lead converted into sales
Porcentaje de cumplimiento de objetivos: Percentage of the sales objetive achivement based on the amount of contracts signed
Consigue los objetivos trimestrales de v: Achieve quarterly sales goals with the highest business efficiency
En esta simulación, los alumnos protagon: In this simulation, students take the role of business managers within an organization, where they have a sales goal and perform their business activity in a three-month window of time.
Dentro de su función comercial, el alumn: As part of their business responsibilities, students have four main blocks of activities that compose sales cycle processes:
Durante el juego, el alumno puede genera: During the game, students may generate new prospective customers who have varying theoretical degrees of propensity to making a purchase. In this first lead stage, propensity of prospective customers to making a purchase is only apparent, since the student has not yet had the chance to contact him and verify it. It is displayed by showing color-coded prospective customers: green for a greater degree of propensity to a purchase, orange for an intermediate degree, and red for a theoretical lesser degree of propensity.
La generación de clientes potenciales se: The generation of prospective customers may be done individually or as a group. Individual generation of prospective customers consumes more game time, but generates prospective customers with a greater theoretical degree of propensity to purchase. Batch generation of prospective customers, such as the collection of information from a database, consumes less time per client than the individual one, but tends to generate prospective customers that are of lower quality in regard to their degree of theoretical propensity to a purchase.
Como en el resto de la gamificación, en: Just as in the rest of the gamification, in Sales Cyclum actions to be performed in-game on any customer, at any time, are carried out by previously activating the selected customer using the button on top of his icon.
La propensión real a la compra del clien: A prospective customer’s actual propensity to making a purchase is obtained by performing a contact, represented by the Verify Propensity button after selecting the prospective customer to be verified. After this action, the prospective customer will display his actual degree of propensity to purchase using a color code, brighter than the previous one, that conveys the following: green is the highest actual degree of propensity to purchase, orange is a lower actual degree of propensity to purchase, and red represents a negative prospective customer over which no further action can be performed. A greater theoretical propensity usually results in a greater actual propensity, and likewise, a lower theoretical propensity usually results in a lower actual propensity or a negative contact, but this is not necessarily always so. In fact, a red theoretical prospective customer could result in a green actual prospective customer after the verification process. Conversely, a green theoretical prospective customer may result in a negative prospective customer after the verification process.
En función del resultado del proceso ver: Based on the result of the verification process, the prospective customer will or will not have accepted to receive a sales visit: negative ones will have rejected it, green and orange ones will have accepted, maintaining or changing their color during this process, and maybe modifying their degree of propensity to purchase. The icons will move from the first segment of the control panel – Leads – toward the second – Visits.
En este grupo tendremos los clientes pot: In this group we will have the prospective customers that have accepted to receive a sales visit, with a greater or lesser propensity to purchase; green or orange respectively. For each of them, we need to carry out a process of preparation for the visit that may be one of three types:
Consume más tiempo pero facilita, aunque: Consumes more time but facilitates, but does not guarantee, prospective customers to accept moving on to the offer reception phase, and doing so with a higher propensity to purchase
Consume un tiempo medio y tiene un efect: Consumes an intermediate amount of time and has a neutral effect on prospective customers accepting moving on to the offer reception phase
Consume poco tiempo pero puede generar m: Consumes little time but may, though not necessarily, generate more negativity on prospective customers, or a lesser degree of propensity to purchase in positive ones
Adicionalmente hay un estado en el caso: Additionally, there is a state in the case of prospective customers for whom no form of visit preparation has been performed.
Pendiente de preparar la visita. Los cli: Visit preparation pending. Prospective customers need some form of visit preparation before being visited.
El siguiente paso es realizar la visita: The next step is to carry out the sales visit. Once again, the prospective customer is selected using its corresponding button and the option to Perform visit is selected. In this case, variability is associated with the duration of the visit, which usually has an intermediate duration, though at times there are positive or negative deviations in the duration in relation to the mean. It is a normal distribution. Visually, they are reflected inside the visits block with the following indicator:
Tras la visita comercial y como resultad: After the sales visit and as a result of this stage, some prospective customers will accept moving on to the following stage – offer management –, while others will end their interest on the product, turning red and adding to the negativity list.
El proceso de gestión de ofertas tiene d: The offer management process has two parts: offer crafting and its presentation. Crafting is a mandatory process with a constant duration. The presentation of the offer is a process that, like in the case of the sales visit, may have a variable duration, which may be longer or shorter than the mean. These time variations are displayed on-screen in the offers block, in the same manner that the duration of sales visits are displayed.
Nuevamente, como resultado final de esta: Once again, as a result of this stage we will have prospective customers that will accept moving on to the next stage – contract meeting –, colored green and orange, and other will end their interest on the product, turning red and adding to the negativity list.
Tras la visita comercial y como resultad: After the sales visit and as a result of this stage, some prospective customers will accept moving on to the following stage – offer management –, while others will reject the product offering, turning red and adding to the negativity list. As usual, we select the prospective customer on whom we want to perform the action using the button over its icon.
En esta fase, la acción a realizar es re: In this stage, the action to be performed is holding the contract closure meeting. Once again, the result of this meeting is variable, depending on the degree of the prospective customer’s propensity to purchase. The time of the meeting, as in previous cases, may also vary in relation to the mean value.
Como resultado del proceso tendremos un: As a result of the process, we will have a signed contract, or a case of negativity in the last stage of the process.
Este bloque del panel de control, muestr: This control panel block shows the cumulative list of contracts entered into in green, and the cumulative list of negative responses during this stage in red.
El juego transcurre durante una ventana: The game takes place during a virtual window of time that represents a quarter. The player performs his daily duties as a business manager and each task consumes a certain amount of time out of the total available time. As already explained, the time taken by each task may be fixed or variable. In the time management segment of the control panel you can see at all times the percentage of total time consumed in each quarter, and that corresponding to the current month.
Además, en el segmento del panel de cont: In addition, in the parameters & graphs control panel segment, you can see the relative time consumption of each task that is performed during the business management process. These time consumptions are also displayed below.
Cambio del grado de propensión de los cl: Change of prospective customer degree of propensity in time
Un cliente potencial pendiente de recibi: A prospective customer that is expecting a sales visit, an offer, or to hold a meeting to close the contract may degrade its degree of propensity to purchase if those actions do not take place within a certain timeframe, which is variable. In these cases, prospective customers turn the new color that reflects their state.
El alumno deberá alcanzar el objetivo de: The student must reach the sales goals set forth before spending the total time of the gamification, which represents a quarter. The level of accomplishment of this goal can be seen in the parameters segment labeled goal accomplishment at any time during execution of the game.
El juego proporciona un panel de control: The game offers a control panel that the user can employ to interact with the gamification and perform his decision making process. The control panel has several functional segments. The first segment is the one that contains the buttons that can be used to start and end the simulation. The End button allows for an early exit from the simulation, but you should keep in mind that the result of all executions of the simulation, even those that are terminated early, are recorded along with all usage data in order to facilitate the collection of results for courses. It is therefore not recommended to use this option during academic tests without checking with your instructor or instance administrator.
El segundo segmento está dividido en cua: The second segment is divided into four blocks:
El funcionamiento de los procesos de est: The functioning of the processes in this segment has been previously explained within the game rules.
El siguiente segmento del panel de contr: The following segment of the control panel offers information about the value of the gamification’s parameters; for example, the value set for sales goal accomplishment. This value may be modified by the instructor of the gamification instance. This segment also includes the relative duration of each of the tasks to be performed during the game.
En el resto de segmentos del panel de co: Using the rest of the segments in the control panel, you can access at any time graphical information showing the degree of business efficiency, the conversion rate and the level of goal accomplishment. The definition of each of these concepts is included in the panel.
¿Quieres disfrutar de la simulación comp: Do you want to run the whole simulation?

El juego ilustra la complejidad del proc: The game demonstrates the complexity of the decision-making process when managing a business that, as part of the supply chain, aims to offer the highest level of service to its customers while incurring on the lowest possible operating costs.
Reto: conseguir el máximo nivel de servi: Challenge: achieve the maximum level of service with the best possible profit
El juego ilustra la importancia de la ad: The game demonstrates the importance of an adequate time management in each stage of the business activity, within the sales cycle: from the moment a sales opportunity or prospect customer is identified, through the various business processes, until the sale is closed. The goal is to achieve the sales goals with the highest business efficiency.
Reto: conseguir los objetivos de venta c: Challenge: achieve sales goals with the best business efficiency
Un nuevo concepto \"más dulce\" del clás: An all-new, "sweeter" take on the classic "Beer Game".
es una gamificación inspirada en el clás: is a gamification inspired by the classic
, desarrollado originalmente en los años: , first developed in the 1960s at the MIT (Massachusetts Institute of Technology) Sloan School of Management, U.S.A. The game demonstrates the complexity of the decision-making process when managing a business that, as part of a supply chain, aims to offer the highest level of service to its customers while incurring on the lowest possible operating costs. With an all-new functionality and the most advanced technology, it provides an exceptional tool for educators and students who wish to interactively and visually analyze key aspects of the world of operations.
El reto de conseguir el mayor nivel de s: The challenge is to attain the highest level of service with the lowest operating costs
En esta simulación, los alumnos se posic: In this simulation, students take the role of a distributor at the intermediate node of a supply chain formed by the manufacturer, the distributor and the point of sale. They perform operations with customers, from whom they receive orders; and suppliers, from whom they receive products. The objective is to manage the supply chain as efficiently as possible, offering the highest possible level of service while incurring on the lowest possible operating costs. The game takes place in a time window of 40 periods of time, which simulate as many periods of activity of the distributor. As with any operating model of real life, in each period students receive the demand from their customers and, by means of orders, they request products from their suppliers, operating from the distribution warehouse. On each period, the system generates a random demand arising from the customer node, which varies within a certain threshold.
establecen los ingresos por venta de pro: set forth revenues for product sales, carry and stock-out costs, purchase costs and lead times. It may be played individually or in teams, and the game offers a wide range of real-time graphical information regarding the level of service delivered and the profit accrued in each period. The simulation is available for individual users and organizations, including companies, educational centers and business schools.
Permite variar el grado de dificultad y: It allows for the degree of difficulty to be adjusted and logs individual player results.
Juego de Bombones dispone de un módulo d: Candies Game has an administration module that is specially designed to provide specific value-added functionalities to educators. More specifically, the administrator may modify the contents of the parameters that impact the game’s behavior for his group of students:
Esta posibilidad ofrece al formador una: This feature offers the instructor an ideal hands-on tool to explain the effect changes have across different operational variables of the gamification. For example, that of supplier lead times in the level of service and profit, testing whether it makes sense to pay more for the same product to a supplier that offers a shorter lead time, or comparing the effects of demand variability in stock management and profit.
Se recomienda invitar a los alumnos a re: It is recommended to encourage students to perform different playthroughs in which these parameters are assigned different values, increasing the difficulty and observing the impact on the level of service and profit graphs. Students may compete with each other to be the best.
Los formadores también tienen acceso a l: Instructors also have access to the final result of each execution for each of the players in their group or instance; therefore, Candies Game may be used as an on-line evaluation tool.
Reto: conseguir los objetivos comerciale: Challenge: achieve business goals with the best business efficiency
Innovación al servicio de la formación e: Innovation at the service of business management training
Las actividades del ciclo de ventas anal: In-depth analysis of sales cycle activities
es una gamificación que ilustra la impor: is a gamification that illustrates the importance of adequate time management at each stage of business activities, within the sales cycle: from the moment a new lead or prospective customer is identified, through the various business processes, until a sale is closed.
Por su diseño, que incluye los procesos: Due to its design, which includes the usual processes of any business organization, it is a highly valuable tool when training sales personnel of all sectors. Lead generation and evaluation, preparation and performance of sales visits, preparation and presentation of offers and sales closure meetings are parts of the main process. With a functionality focused on illustrating the key aspects for the success of the sales cycle and relying on the most advanced technology, it is an exceptional solution for educators and students who want to analyze, interactively and visually, the key aspects of the world of business management.
El reto de conseguir los objetivos de ve: The challenge of accomplishing sales goals with the highest level of business efficiency
En esta simulación, los alumnos se enfre: In this simulation, students face the challenge of accomplishing sales goals. These goals have a default value that may be modified by the instructor or game administrator. They have full autonomy on their daily management to perform business tasks and make any decision they consider to be the most appropriate. Just like in real life, Sales Cyclum users need to perform various tasks in order to accomplish their goals, such as generating leads, evaluating their prospective customers’ propensity to making a purchase, organizing visits to explain the products, preparing offers, present them and arrange meetings to close the sales. The gamification introduces certain variability criteria in the success of tasks or their duration, in addition to establishing the degrees of propensity to making a purchase for prospective customers, just as what happens in real life. The challenge is to achieve set sales goals in the timeframe allotted for such purpose.
Las reglas de Sales Cyclum establecen un: Sales Cyclum rules establish an average duration for the performance of the tasks based on type of activity. This duration is sometimes subject to variations; for example, the time dedicated to the carrying out meetings with customers. It also allows the student to execute tasks with a greater or lesser degree of dedication or arrange them based on various criteria, depending his business strategy. An adequate time management is fundamental in order to achieve set goals. It can be played individually or as a group and the game offers a wide range of graphic real-time information on the level of efficiency, the degree of goal accomplishment, the conversion rate or the percentage of time spent. The simulation is available to any user and organization, including companies, training centers and business schools.
Sales Cyclum dispone de un módulo de adm: Sales Cyclum has an administration module especially designed to provide specific value-added functionality for trainers. More specifically, the administrator will be able to modify the content of parameters that affect the game’s behavior for his group of students:
Número de oportunidades generadas por la: Number of leads generated by the option to add a set of leads
Número de contratos trimestrales necesar: Number of quarterly contracts necessary to accomplish sales goals
Esta posibilidad ofrece al formador una: This opportunity offers trainers an ideal tool to adjust the difficulty in the degree of accomplishment of business goals for students. It is recommended to encourage students to perform several game executions, increasing the difficulty and observing the impact in conversion rate and business efficiency level graphs. Students may compete to be the best.
Los formadores también tienen acceso a l: Trainers also have access to the final results of each execution for each of the players in their group or instance. As a result, Sales Cyclum can be used as an online evaluation tool.
Preparación y realización de visitas com: Preparation and performance of sales visits
